articles.description: Susan Dempster and friend Hilda McDougall, both from Glasgow, have still not been reunited with their luggage after almost two weeks. It went missing after their flight to Glasgow was cancelled.
articles.content:
A woman's dream £8,000 holiday to celebrate her 60th birthday has been ruined after British Airways lost her luggage.
Susan Dempster and her friend Hilda McDougall, both from Glasgow, landed at Heat… [+2967 chars]
